mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_title, m.nickname FROM art_market_db.product p , art_market_db.member m WHERE category = 'character' AND p.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY p.product_date DESC

SELECT f.file_path, f.file_name FROM art_market_db.file f, art_market_db.product p WHERE category = 'character' AND f.file_path = 'PRODUCT' AND p.product_id = f.file_type_id ORDER BY f.file_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_title, m.nickname FROM art_market_db.product p , art_market_db.member m WHERE category = 'illust' AND p.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY p.product_date DESC
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_title, m.nickname FROM art_market_db.product p , art_market_db.member m WHERE category = 'live' AND p.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY p.product_date DESC
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_title, m.nickname FROM art_market_db.product p , art_market_db.member m WHERE category = 'design' AND p.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY p.product_date DESC
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_title, m.nickname FROM art_market_db.product p , art_market_db.member m WHERE category = 'video' AND p.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY p.product_date DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_title, m.nickname FROM art_market_db.product p , art_market_db.member m, art_market_db.order o WHERE p.member_id = m.member_id AND p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY count(o.product_id) DESC
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_title, m.nickname FROM art_market_db.product p , art_market_db.member m WHERE p.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY p.product_date DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_title, m.nickname FROM art_market_db.product p , art_market_db.member m WHERE p.member_id = m.member_id AND (p.product_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{categoryKeyword}, '%') OR m.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{categoryKeyword}, '%') OR p.category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{categoryKeyword}, '%')) ORDER BY p.product_date DESC

SELECT m.nickname, f.file_path, f.file_name FROM art_market_db.product p , art_market_db.member m, art_market_db.file f WHERE f.file_path = 'PROFILE' AND p.product_id = #{productId} AND p.member_id = m.member_id AND p.product_id = f.file_type_id

SELECT f.file_path, f.file_name FROM art_market_db.file f, art_market_db.product p WHERE f.file_path = 'PRODUCT' AND p.product_id = #{productId} AND p.product_id = f.file_type_id ORDER BY f.file_date ASC
